= Details =

*bold*host

  * type: String

port
  * websphere soap port
  * type Integer

bindPreferences
  * binding preferences, es: { defaultbinding.virtual.host=default_host ]
  * type java.util.Properties

earFile
  * ear path
  * type: String 

appName
  * installation app name
  * type: String

target
  * websphere target 
  * type: String
